Title: Stage Door
Writer: Morrie Ryskind (screen play), Anthony Veiller (screen play), Edna Ferber (from the play by), George S. Kaufman (from the play by)
Actors: Katharine Hepburn, Ginger Rogers, Adolphe Menjou, Gail Patrick
Plot: A chronicle of the ambitions, dreams, and disappointments of aspiring actresses who all live in the same boarding house.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
